title: My Pixel 3 photo gallery freezes since I updated to Android 11
content: When I'm deleting pictures in Google Photo Gallery, after I delete a picture it takes at least 5 seconds to process.  This begin occuring 2 weeks ago after updating Android.  When deleting a picture in Gallery before it would immediately go to the next picture, but not the picture becomes pixelated and skips the next picture, instead going to the picture after the next.  I have no idea why this is occurring.  Can someone please help?
